title: Music of the IWCA

embed.description: International Wildcard All-Stars is a 4-day event held in Melbourne, Australia. All-Stars from Oceania, Brazil, Commonwealth of Independent States, Japan, Latin America, Southeast Asia and Turkey are competing for the IWCA crown. You can find out more information at http://promo.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/iwca-event/index.html

body:
Hey Riot,
I was wondering if it would be possible to get the music that's playing for this champion select? I think its really cool and I'd love to listen to it without having to wait for the OPL to stream!
Thanks,
og1764

replies.body:
Thanks for the quick reply, sorry I didnt reply earlier I was too busy making it my own champion select music.
Do you have a playlist of all of the music that the OPL uses for their streams, similar to the way that the NA LCS and the EU LCS has a list of music [that they use for the LCS **here** ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/203822794-2015-Season-LCS-Music-List) ?
Thanks again,
og1764
Seconding this question, I love the OCE broadcast music more than the other regions by far! A major step up from the days of Pentakill on repeat!
